solution_line_template: Gus eats {eggs_breakfast} + {eggs_lunch} = <<{eggs_breakfast}+{eggs_lunch}={eggs_breakfast_lunch}>>{eggs_breakfast_lunch} eggs for breakfast and lunch.
Including dinner, he eats a total of {eggs_breakfast_lunch} + {eggs_dinner} = <<{eggs_breakfast_lunch}+{eggs_dinner}={total_eggs}>>{total_eggs} eggs.
